panels.visual: Dog's head snaps up, ears pricked toward darkness. An arrow whistles out of the night and strikes the saddle where Giovanni's head had been resting moments before. Gan's hand finds her bow without conscious thought. The fire has burned to dark embers.

Sadia's sword finds a bandit's chest before he has taken three steps, the body crashing into the fire and scattering embers. Behind her, Bansi's blade opens another from hip to shoulder. Giovanni's dagger finds its mark in an attacker's shoulder blades.
panels.narration: What followed was brief and brutal.

panels.visual: Wide shot of the camp in chaos. Gan's arrow takes a bandit in the leg. Dog is on him instantly, teeth finding the arm that holds the sword. Lueduo hurls a javelin. Bandits charge from the darkness, blades gleaming in dying firelight. Embers scatter across the packed earth.
